reviews.review_msg: Tracey was not very good at specifying what her expectations for the class were. It is a 100 level course that required scientific research for the essay assignment. People who had not written this type of essay before were left in the dark on what was needed. She gave constructive criticism, but did so in a harsh way. Felt like a 200- 300 level.

I took this class as a breadth-sci course as a student two sem's from grad. Tracey's a fine instructor; her lectures & slides are relevant and clear. But the class is built on busy-work. Online submissions and peer reviews on Mon., potential online submissions on Wed., online quiz every Friday, a textbook you could kill a cow with. Exhausting.

Designing prof for on-line Educ 220, but didn't interact outside the initial intros.  The entire class was run by 2 TMs; one of which was almost non-existant.  No guidance or support with respect to mid-term or final.  M/C questions were very random.  Short answer were picky.  Essays included stupid concept maps. Online discussions were redundant

I'm not sure why all the terrible feedback, I thought she was ok.  I went to see her for help a few times and she was very willing to help.  Attending class and reading the text is a must in order to understand the material.  There is no floating through this class.  If you put in work it will pay off as it did for me.

mixed evaluation -valid concerns in grading, harder then necessary marker based on a 200 level university course -encourages class discussion, makes initiative to answer questions -DONT take course if applying to grad programs, will bring down GPA -Do take course to upgrade yourself ie. professional development/learn how to do/evaluate research

Horrible.  Plain and simple.  She looks to belittle students and seems to enjoy destroying the comments and assistance requests from the students whose fees employ her.  She is truly a horrible, unhappy and mean spirited lady.  Absolutely discusting!!!
awful prof. always late. i was interested in the material before i had her as  teacher. avoid at all costs. the course itself is easy.
Horrible prof. Rude and impersonal. talks in circles. Looks organized but is afraid to admit she makes mistakes. Run while you can.
Awsome teacher, don't take this class if you are one of those stupid people who doesn't like to put in effort. Knows her material very well, would definatly take a class with her again

I dont know what the fuss is about. I'm an average student.. and I did well She is a very organized prof, who's lecture might be dry, but she gives great notes, which you can download ahead of time, and then during lecture she gives tons of examples...exams were not bad, as long as u study text the text and notes. No surprises.
Those who can, do. Those who can't, teach. Those who can't teach, are education professors.
She was ok.  However, her lectures were dry and sterile.
